text: ਸਚੜੈ ਆਪਿ ਜਗਤੁ ਉਪਾਇਆ ਗੁਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਘੋਰ ਅੰਧਾਰੋ ॥

translation.text: The True Lord Himself created the world; without the Guru, there is only pitch darkness.

transliteration.text: sacharai āp jagat upāiā gur bin ghōr andhārō .

melody.description: Vadhans is based on Punjabi Folk music and is set in the traditions of ‘Ghoreea’, ‘Suhag’ and ‘Alohnian’.
